column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou's is our favorite pizza place in the city. If we're not going with the classic Sausage deep dish with butter crust
column2: then we get "The Lou" with sausage pieces. Super tasty. Best to have fresh in the restaurant as with delivery all of those delicious toppings can get a little soggy. The Malnati Salad is delicious - we bought their dressing to bring home. So good! They also support the community
column3: which is very admirable. They have donated to our fundraiser the past two years. Thank you Lou's!!
